extendedInfo.description: ChiRyujin!  The power of the life that begins to spring accomplishes BigTree and the wish from the bud. SouRyujin! The cloud is manipulated, the bird is accompanied, it is scaring exceeds, and all the one is revolutionized.Dragon Live WallpaperTwo animations to enjoy!Change other animation by scrolling.Replay and pause by tap.*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Ground & Blue Dragon*Portrait only.*Please try the free version first.https://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall.GroundBlueDragonFree*The scrolling depends behavior of Home application.If scrolling does not work or something strange, try to check Home app's settings.(scrolling speed, overshoot, etc.)*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.
